mission_data.playerShipNames_arme: TSN Sabre\TSN Valiant\TSN Lancer\TSN Stalker\TSN Viper\TSN Horizon\TSN Necessity\TSN Hunter

set_ship_text.name: Serrin
set_ship_text.desc: Independent nebula refinery founded by the Serrin family. Established 2126.

set_ship_text.name: Soulin
set_ship_text.desc: Civilian station and tourist destination. Popular despite its proximity to the Hegemony border thanks to the particularly spectacular nebulae nearby.

set_ship_text.name: Harrling
set_ship_text.desc: Civilian station in private ownership, established 2236 by Harold Harrling.

set_ship_text.name: RS-9992
set_ship_text.desc: Originally designated RS-92, but an unfortunate typo led to it being registered as RS-9992. The resident scientists consider this a charm of good fortune.

set_ship_text.name: Charon Forward Command
set_ship_text.desc: Military command post overseeing activity at the Charon-Norayne border.

set_ship_text.name: Casarosso
set_ship_text.desc: Civilian station, drawn here by the market opportunities presented by the military industry in the sector.
